mainContent.heading: What is the Video Grid Section?
paragraphs: The Video Grid Section is a Shopify section designed to display multiple videos in a structured grid format, making it easy to showcase rich visual content across your storefront.
It works well for product demonstrations, testimonials, brand storytelling, or educational content, helping visitors quickly understand your message through video.
The layout is designed to integrate seamlessly into modern Shopify themes while maintaining fast load times and a clean visual hierarchy.
